name: Kitten Assassin
description:
Kitten Assassin! A sniper arcade game where cats and dogs pitted against one another in epic battle of good vs evil.

Play as a Kitten Assassin, a kitten pushed too far by the tyrannical dogs that rule Dogmana. Your mission - get your revenge and reclaim your home. Kill dog generals one by one until you've rescued your Kitty Comrades and settled the score. Cute cartoons meet extreme violence in this blood gushing, head exploding, adventure across treacherous lands.

YOUR GUNS
Collect cash rewards and upgrade your weapons as you rid the world of dictator dogs.

UNIQUE ENVIRONMENTS
Set up your scope and take aim in 30+ unique locations!

CHALLENGE YOURSELF
Need more of a challenge? Try the elite version of every level to test your sniper skills!

FULLY ANIMATED SEQUENCES
Featuring fully animated cut scenes that tell the tragic tale and uprising of Kitten Assassin.

CELEBRITY VOICE OVERS
Game voiced by unique voice actors including Mark Meer! The voice of Commander Shepard himself.

Come join Kitten Assassin on this thrilling adventure of gunpowder, blood, and vengeance!

“Like” Kitten Assassin on Facebook -
https://www.facebook.com/KittenAssassin
___________________________

Kitten Assassin is brought to you by Fluik Entertainment, makers of wicked-fun mobile games such as Office Jerk, Plumber Crack and Streaker Run. Search the App Store for “Fluik” to browse all our games.

Follow @FluikGames on Twitter for awesome game announcements and other updates.

NOTE:
Please don't include bug reports in your app reviews. We can't respond to you directly, so it can be difficult for us to offer help or properly debug the situation. You can post all bugs or suggestions on the Facebook fan page, or email us via support@fluik.com
